meanings.sent1: She succeeded inasmuch as she worked hard.
meanings.sent2: He failed inasmuch as he didn't study for the test.
meanings.sent3: The cat caught the mouse inasmuch as it pounced swiftly.
meanings.sent4: His determination soared inasmuch as the challenges grew tougher.
meanings.sent5: The flower bloomed beautifully inasmuch as the sun shone brightly.

meanings.definition: In view of the fact that
meanings.sent1: Inasmuch as it rained, the picnic was canceled.
meanings.sent2: We decided to postpone the meeting inasmuch as many attendees were absent.
meanings.sent3: The party was a success inasmuch as everyone danced joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The project was completed on time inasmuch as the team worked efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The decision was made inasmuch as it was the best option available.
